title: Rise of the Robots X
description: Limited to 100 tickets! Access the game before the official launch and participate to the last debugging round. You will have more time to prepare for the eSport tournaments.
longDescription:
<!--clickableImage-->
[![Rise of the Robots X-ytv3t](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/8a8d42193d4840d4a3bee3551b60d579/rise-of-the-robots-x-ytv3t.jpg)](https://riseoftherobotsx.com/)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Roadmap
<!--text-->
**a0.8 version & playtests**

We are currently working on a new version of the game with improvements and features to offer you a target experience for the game's release, with important additions such as:

**- Faction System**

Choose between 4 Factions, giving you access to an "**Elite**" Robot Archetype with exclusive skills.

**- Tutorial**

We will guide you by discovering the basics and features of the game, before entering the PvP Arena.

**- Technical, graphic, and sound updates**

Adding animations, 3D modeling of Robots, new User Interface, new identity, graphics engine, adding OST.

**- Missions**

A system of missions to complete in order to obtain Credits, Xenoshards and other cosmetic items.


A playtest (**Q4 2024**) will be set up for those who want to participate. You will be able to discover these new improvements and try to win an exclusive gift.

**Add the game to your wishlist** and join the official [Discord](https://discord.gg/r8WdczQY9Y) to be kept informed of the launch of the playtest.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About This Game
<!--text-->
### Wishlist the game to help us getting visibility!

**Join the official game's Discord and Social Networks.**

1. Discover Rise of the Robots X, meet other Strategists and develop the community.
2. Contribute and follow the development of the game and be informed when new improvements are made.
3. Share your ideas, give your opinion, and vote for artistic and gameplay elements.
4. Participate in contests and design with the team content that we will add to the game.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The game
<!--text-->
Rise of the Robots X combines elements from **deck builders, hex-based board games, 4X, strategy and tactical video games**, to create a truly innovative experience in synchronous turn-based strategy game.

Immerse yourself in Robot battles in Rise of the Robots X.

- **Collect over 90 powerful Robots**
- Build your army adapted to your playstyle, and execute your strategy to be victorious
- **Fight against players from around the world, solo or with friends**, and show your tactical superiority by destroying the enemy base

You're a Strategist, a war commander with sharp skills and unrivaled tactics, leading your Faction and its army of Robots on the Arena.

**Four Factions** in a merciless fight: the Verbas, the Wyrns, the Khrals and the Farngs.

Each Faction has their strengths and own « **Elite** » Robot Archetype that will define your playstyle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Build your Robot army
<!--text-->
With over **290 cards** to collect and millions of possible combinations, Rise of the Robots X give the possibility to customize your own Army to your playstyle.

Assemble your Robots to **build your army**, according to the strategy you want to adopt.

Your army must be able to be adapted to different situations, your opponents and Arenas.

Experiment different combinations and synergies to find the **strategy that suits you best**.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unlock Elite Robots
<!--text-->
Each Faction has their own benefits and gives you access to an exclusive « **Elite** » Robot Archetype.

Your Faction's « **Elite** » Robots will define your gameplay, with the **6 other common Robots Archetypes**.

You will get granted of a permanent resource generation bonus plus a special ability that will help you to be victorious.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Competitive PvP game modes
<!--text-->
Battle in **hexagonal tiles Arenas**.

Each Arena offers a variety of terrain types and Infrastructures that are critical to control.

Discover a variety of game modes that give players a variety of ways to compete and test their skills:


- Competitive « Ranked » mode (1v1, 2v2, 3v3)
- « Unranked » mode (1v1, 2v2, 3v3)
- « Free-For-All » mode (1v1v1)

Whether you prefer to battle with your teammates or the adrenaline of a 1v1 (*one-versus-one*), our matchmaking system had been developed to find players with a similar army of your strength.

**Be creative and combine your talents to defeat your opponents.**

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unique Gameplay splitted by Rounds
<!--text-->
Each matches are defined with a system of dynamic and rhythmic "*Rounds*" that follow one another until you destroy your opponent Base.

This innovative system introduces the effect of **surprise and tension, by synchronizing analysis Phases and simultaneous actions.**

Victory is based on choices you made by anticipating the movements of your opponents, adapting your assault to the terrain of the Arena and composing an effective army according to the situations. **Rise of the Robots X offers an opportunity to create complex and personalized plans, adapted to your playstyle and the events during the battle.**

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Collect Robots and develop your Base
<!--text-->
Each Robot has its own characteristics and skills. **Unlock new Robot cards and level them up**, transform them into a powerful and strong weapon for your battles.

Find your Robots in your Base, see their details and customize them. In order to bring you additional elements to the gameplay, **cosmetics will allow you to enhance your Base and your Robots**: such as skins, animations, or sound elements.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Competitive esports game
<!--text-->
**Our ambition is to allow every player to participate in competitive ladders without any limits.**

Join our tournaments by a single click and try to climb the PvP (Player versus Player) ranking to get a chance to win customization for your nickname, icons and other new cosmetics.

Compete against other players, **solo or in a team**, where your tactical choices will lead to recognition from your peers.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Updates and support
<!--text-->
As game as a service, Rise of the Robots X will delivers continuous development and proximity to the community.

In order to give a captivating experience, some updates will be added to the game, such as:

- **New Robots**
- **New game modes**
- Organization of **competitions and special events **(online & IRL)
- Implementation of exclusive cosmetics
- Development of the Lore (in-game and website)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Economy
<!--text-->
Rise of the Robots X is a **Free-to-play game**, all its content is unlockable by playing.

Our game currency (*Credits*) as the premium currency (*Xenoshards*) offer the possibility to unlock new Robots and access to cosmetics less or more quickly, **without blocking the progression of players or the acquisition of in-game advantage**s.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Join the Rise of the Robots X community
<!--text-->
- [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/r8WdczQY9Y)
- [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/riseoftherobotsx)
- [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@RiseoftheRobotsX)

**– Mental, and Vaillance, Strategist.**
